span.p: Data deleted 2 years after account closure

display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: Transaction data kept 3 years for support

display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p: Financial records kept 7 years for tax purposes

span.p: Ledger data kept 10 years for auditing

span.p: Customer Info Database - Names, Contact details, Account IDs [Retention: Active + 2 years]

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: Billing Database - Transaction records, Payment tokens [Retention: 3 years]

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: Finance Data Lake - Transaction records (with IDs), Usage data (pseudonymized) [Retention: 7 years]

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: General Ledger System - Aggregated financial data, Limited personal data [Retention: 10 years]

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: Archived Records - Legal compliance data, Pseudonymized [Retention: 7-10 years]

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: Anonymous Analytics - Statistical usage data, No personal identifiers [Retention: Indefinite]
